page.title: 12HARMBY AREA - ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: THE YOUNG FARMERS CLUB IS POPULAR HERE AND HAS FIFTY MEMBERS.THROUGH TALKS AND PRACTICAL WORK THEY LEARN ABOUT ALL ASPECTS OF FARMING. BROWNIES ARE ALSO POPULAR AND SPENNITHORNE GROUP NORMALLY HAS ABOUT FIFTEEN MEMBERS. THE W.I. MEET MONTHLY ON WEDNESDAYS. THEY HAVE TALKS AND DEMONSTRATIONS ABOUT VARIOUS TOPICS.NORMALLY TWENTY LADIES ATTEND. THE OVER SIXTY CLUB HAS FORTY MEMBERS WHO MEET WEEKLY ON TUESDAYS.THEY PLAY DOMINOES,CARDS AND HAVE OUTINGS. THERE ARE NO CINEMAS OR THEATRES IN THIS AREA. GARDENING IS A POPULAR HOBBY.ABOUT HALF A MILE AWAY THE RIVER URE IS AN EXCELLENT PLACE FOR FISHING.PEOPLE PREFER TO BE OUTSIDE INSTEAD OF INSIDE SKIPPING,MARBLES CONKERS LUCY LOCKETT AND HOP_SCOTCH ARE STILL POPULAR GAMES
